plugins.name: admin-menu-editor/menu-editor.php
plugins.title: Admin Menu Editor
plugins.author: Janis Elsts
plugins.description: Lets you directly edit the WordPress admin menu. You can re-order, hide or rename existing menus, add custom menus and more. By Janis Elsts.

plugins.name: extensions-keep/extensions-keep.php
plugins.title: Extensions Keep
plugins.author: Paul Fleury
plugins.description: Simplify your extension management: export, install and share in a single click. By Paul Fleury.

plugins.name: plugin-check/plugin.php
plugins.title: Plugin Check (PCP)
plugins.author: WordPress Performance Team and Plugin Review Team
plugins.description: Plugin Check is a WordPress.org tool which provides checks to help plugins meet the directory requirements and follow various best practices. <cite>By WordPress Performance Team and Plugin Review Team.</cite>

plugins.name: regenerate-thumbnails/regenerate-thumbnails.php
plugins.title: Regenerate Thumbnails
plugins.author: Alex Mills (Viper007Bond)
plugins.description: Regenerate the thumbnails for one or more of your image uploads. Useful when changing their sizes or your theme. By Alex Mills (Viper007Bond).

plugins.name: safe-svg/safe-svg.php
plugins.title: Safe SVG
plugins.author: 10up
plugins.description: Enable SVG uploads and sanitize them to stop XML/SVG vulnerabilities in your WordPress website By 10up.

plugins.name: simple-history/index.php
plugins.title: Simple History
plugins.author: Pär Thernström
plugins.description: Plugin that logs various things that occur in WordPress and then presents those events in a very nice GUI. By Pär Thernström.

plugins.name: sje-simple-json-editor/simple-json-editor.php
plugins.title: SJE - Simple JSON Editor
plugins.author: Paul Fleury
plugins.description: An elegant and easy-to-use JSON editor for your WordPress theme files By Paul Fleury.

plugins.name: wp-sweep/wp-sweep.php
plugins.title: WP-Sweep
plugins.author: Lester 'GaMerZ' Chan
plugins.description: WP-Sweep allows you to clean up unused, orphaned and duplicated data in your WordPress. It cleans up revisions, auto drafts, unapproved comments, spam comments, trashed comments, orphan post meta, orphan comment meta, orphan user meta, orphan term relationships, unused terms, duplicated post meta, duplicated comment meta, duplicated user meta and transient options. It also optimizes your database tables. By Lester 'GaMerZ' Chan.
